title: Console settings storage: Separate settings per window title?
body: From the blog post: "Settings in the console are stored in an interesting manner: The title of the window of the console represents where the settings are stored in the registry"

comments.body: Further testing has shown that changing the window title and then changing settings seem to still properly update the configuration for that shortcut, so there's at least one concern that may be addressed already.
I'm also aware that powershell supports using a prompt function to automatically set the title on CWD change, and I actually use this myself. This is more concerning CMD.
